about_the_game:
Combine tactics and strategy in this roguelike deckbuilder, where you must build your deck, train and evolve your team. Step into a mystical world where the Genkai battle in a quest for power and harmony, and prepare for the imminent arrival of the Primal Genkai.

Features

  • Build your Genkai team: You will start your adventure with one Genkai, and as you progress, you'll have the opportunity to add more to your team that complement your deck. You can have up to three Genkai simultaneously, each with unique attributes and abilities, allowing you the freedom to experiment with various strategies.

  • Evolution System: Some Genkai can evolve, allowing you to enhance their attributes and gain access to new abilities. Additionally, you can teach them new skills along the way.

  • Deck Building: Unlock new cards and improve your deck as you advance in your Genkai adventure, allowing you to enhance the powers and abilities of your Genkai in combat.

  • Tactical Combat: Utilize a zone-based tactical combat system, increasing the possibilities for creating more devastating strategies.

  • Explore a Mystical World: Immerse yourself in a fantasy world full of mystery and discover the story behind the Primal Genkai.

  • Infinite Replayability: Conquer daily challenges and seek additional attempts to expand your possibilities and face new challenges, providing endless replayability.
